name: Midnight Grub Session
detailed_description:
Snacktical Espionage Action.

This is a game where your goal is to become Dummy Thicc.
You control Jim, a man cursed with the fact that he is Too Slim.
You are tasked with sneaking around your house in the middle of the night, trying to cure yourself of your slimness by any means necessary.
But Beware! The thiccer you get, the harder it will be for you to move stealthily around the house without arousing suspicion.

Do you have what it takes to lead Jim to victory? Probably!

This was originally created for a game jam by a couple of blokes named Matt and Steven.
Play time: Between 15 – 30 Minutes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Graphics: Drivers with support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
